title: Not very interesting
review: This is just like other river that I had ever seen. There was not much water. There is no worth to spend time for this river.

title: amazing expereince water level is low good to visit in summer
review: we stayed in tiger camp resort from the back side we went inside the river amazing experience even in dec, would love to visit in summers

title: 'River of Gold'
review: The name of the river means 'River of Gold'. The name has been derived from the fact that at some point of time, the river's alluvial deposits that were washed down from higher areas were filled with grains of gold. These grains were then collected and processed. As like any place in Jim Corbett National Park, the landscape here is very beautiful.

title: not very much water
review: There was not too much water. not very much intresting .There is no much worth to spend time for this river.

title: Just an average place
review: Everything is average, while the effort required to reach here is above average. Would recommend going to other good places nearby.

title: Beautiful flowing water
review: This is one of the prime river in Corbett national park... The view of the river is very beautiful and the place is nice for family picnics...

title: densely forested
review: its inside corbett national park ... book your entery before you come as no other way of entering the park ... you can entre through either durga devi gate of from kotdwar side .. the sonanadi guest house is beautiful and amzing place to stay ... you will love its calmness... the birds .. animals .. a must go place ... only nature lovers...

title: Not a touristic spot ....
review: Its not actually a touristic spot to visit in my view. Just a normal river like any other. So wont suggest to make a special visit as such.
